channel.title: math.GM updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GM updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Evolution on Sets
item.description: arXiv:2302.12767v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We introduce the notion of evolution on sets and study several sets endowed with this structure and obtain some results about this new notion.
item.dc:creator: Eduardo Santana

item.title: Application of a new iterative formula for computing $\pi$ and nested radicals with roots of $2$
item.description: arXiv:2509.25221v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this work, we obtain an iterative formula that can be used for computing digits of $\pi$ and nested radicals of kind $c_n/\sqrt{2 - c_{n - 1}}$, where $c_0 = 0$ and $c_n = \sqrt{2 + c_{n - 1}}$. We also show how with help of this iterative formula the two-term Machin-like formulas for $\pi$ can be generated and approximated. Some examples with Mathematica codes are presented.
item.dc:creator: Sanjar M. Abrarov, Rehan Siddiqui, Rajinder Kumar Jagpal, Brendan M. Quine
